forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. North northeast wind 14 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy. Low around 50, with temperatures rising to around 52 overnight. North northeast wind 8 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

weather_report:
The dawn of San Francisco today bathes the city in a gentle golden light, revealing the sunlit contours of its famous skyline. With temperatures hovering in the low sixties, it feels fresh and invigorating outside, the kind of briskness that sharpens the senses. A north-northeast breeze carries whispers of the coastal air, steady enough to tousle the leaves but not fierce enough to chill the bones, only enhancing the day’s inviting nature. As the afternoon approaches, the warmth will linger before gracefully giving way to the cooler embrace of the evening, where a few clouds will dot the sky, adding just a hint of mystery to the twilight.

For those stepping outside, layering is the answer; a lightweight jacket paired with a breathable sweater will offer comfort in the changing temperatures. The morning air feels clear, with little to no fog obscuring the view, allowing the golden rays to define the city's architectural marvels and natural beauty. This is a perfect opportunity for a leisurely stroll along the waterfront or perhaps a visit to one of the local cafes that are just starting to awaken. Alternatively, finding a spot in a sun-drenched park with a good book could be the ideal way to savor the present moment. Whether it’s exploring the storied streets or simply enjoying the beauty around, today promises to be a pleasant chapter in the city’s ever-evolving narrative.
